channel.title: 317 logout help
channel.description: Whenever i click logout, it says this in my cmd: [code][client-1-tt3534g]: button id: 14067 [client-1-tt3534g]: Duel button [client-1-tt3534g]: button id: 9154 [client-1-tt3534g]: Duel button Blank Source edited Server: Exception! java.lang.NullPointerException at client.saveit(client.java:11159) at client.logout(client.java:4337) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:10989) at client.process(client.java:8193) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:168) at server.main(server.java:38) Game saved for player tt3534g Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.saveit(client.java:11159) at client.destruct(client.java:4030) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:336) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:188) at server.main(server.java:38)[/code] And freezes my client. Help?

item.title: 317 logout help
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

Whenever i click logout, it says this in my cmd:

[client-1-tt3534g]: button id: 14067 [client-1-tt3534g]: Duel button [client-1-tt3534g]: button id: 9154 [client-1-tt3534g]: Duel button Blank Source edited Server: Exception! java.lang.NullPointerException at client.saveit(client.java:11159) at client.logout(client.java:4337) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:10989) at client.process(client.java:8193) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:168) at server.main(server.java:38) Game saved for player tt3534g Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.saveit(client.java:11159) at client.destruct(client.java:4030) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:336) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:188) at server.main(server.java:38)
And freezes my client.
Help?

Read full topic
